players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the villager.
Day 1 begins.

players.name: Bob
memory: You're Bob, the villager.
Night 1 begins.
The villager Alice was found dead.
Day 1 begins.
Diana: "Charlie, watch your back. Night actions are coming."
Charlie: "I'm the detective. Stay cautious, Diana."
You: "Charlie, investigate Diana. Be cautious of mafia activity."
You: "Charlie, keep investigating. Alice was killed last night, watch out for more mafia activity."
Charlie: "I'm the detective. Diana is mafia, watch out for Bob."
Diana: "Charlie, keep an eye on Bob. Diana hinted at mafia activity."
Votes: Bob voted for Diana, Charlie voted for Diana, Diana voted for Bob
Diana was arrested

Diana: "Charlie, keep an eye on Bob. Diana hinted at mafia activity."

Diana was arrested
